name: ai-career-mentor
description: AI-powered career guidance platform with resume analysis and personalized recommendations

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install-backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
